Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, I understand it's worth $12,000 to you. To make this opportunity more attractive, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This represents a significant savings of 10% off the full value, making it an exceptional deal. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to provide you with a product that will undoubtedly enhance your experience. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
